item.title: Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE launches November 17 for PC, in 2026 for PS5 and Xbox Series
item.content:encoded:
A “Deluxe Edition” will also be available for $44.99, which includes the following content:

Netmarble also released a Developer Note detailing the core gameplay features and philosophy behind the game, emphasizing that the game is a premium title separate from the mobile game Solo Leveling: ARISE, in which Hunters, weapons for Sung Jinwoo and other Hunters, and growth systems are unlocked through gameplay. It also elaborates on creating a distinct experience for consoles and PC, with standalone systems, narrative depth, and controls.

■ Greetings, Hunters!

I am Kim Gwang Hoon, the development producer of Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE.

We are thrilled to greet you for the first time as the development team behind Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE.

With Solo Leveling: ARISE already receiving so much love, developing a new game for PC and console players has brought us not only great excitement and anticipation but also a fair share of fear and serious contemplation about venturing into the unknown.

Still, the desire to reinterpret the epic journey of Solo Leveling in a new dimension, and to present new experiences and deeper gameplay aimed at PC and console that couldn’t be explored in ARISE, has driven our strong spirit of challenge. Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE is our bold new venture.

We understand that many of you may have questions about our new game.

To the current players of Solo Leveling: ARISE, we deeply empathize with your feelings that the arrival of Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE might mean we’re turning our attention away from Solo Leveling: ARISE. And to those of you waiting for Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE, we also recognize the concern that it might end up as nothing more than a simple port of Solo Leveling: ARISE.

But please rest assured, Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE is an entirely different game, developed as an independent project by a separate team.

Solo Leveling: ARISE will continue to evolve on its own path, aiming to provide the best possible gameplay experience. At the same time, Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE is being developed as a distinct PC/console title with its own unique identity. We are doing our utmost to ensure that both projects live up to your expectations.

Now, allow us to share more about how Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE is being developed.

■ Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE is a New Game Experience

What we would like to emphasize first and foremost is that Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE is a full-package game. Rather than relying on randomness when recruiting Hunters or crafting weapons, we’ve designed the game to reward effort and strategy, allowing you to feel a true sense of achievement. All the Hunters, Sung Jinwoo and their weapons, and the joy of progression can be earned and enjoyed entirely through in-game play.

Hunter Recruitment

By Sung Jinwoo’s side stands not only his shadows, but also many skilled Hunters who fight alongside him. In Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE, you can offer each Hunter a payment worthy of their abilities and recruit them to join you in battle.

Weapon Crafting

As a player, you can directly choose and craft your own weapons. Defeat powerful bosses and use the materials you obtain to forge formidable weapons for Sung Jinwoo and the Hunters. By combining various weapons and skill trees, you’ll be able to create a unique combat style that’s entirely your own.

■ What Sets Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE Apart

The passion of Solo Leveling: ARISE now burns anew on PC and console with Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE.

Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE is built upon two core values.

First, deeper and more refined action.

We’ve designed the controls to suit PC and console platforms, maximizing the thrill of weighty and precise combat.

Second, overwhelming immersion.

A world brought to life with next-level PC and console graphics that will fully draw fans into the game’s story, delivering a truly immersive experience.

■ Visuals That Deepen Immersion

We’ve pushed the visual quality of the game to its highest level, so that you can become fully immersed in the world of Solo Leveling.

Background Level Up

Now, You Are There. To bring the iconic moments from the webtoon to life more vividly, we’ve significantly enhanced the detail and quality of the game’s environments. Though the game is based on the original webtoon, the backgrounds are portrayed in a style that bridges the gap between comic and realism, allowing you to not only feel as if you’ve stepped into the webtoon itself, but to experience a whole new level of immersion.

Character Level Up

A brand-new customization system has been added, just for you.

Sung Jinwoo: Styled, Chosen, Completed by You

You can personalize Sung Jinwoo by selecting his hairstyle and hair color, and equipping various facial accessories to create a version of him that’s truly one of a kind.

Highlight Your Party‘s Personality

You can also freely change the hair color of your fellow Hunters, letting their individuality shine even more. Mix and match hairstyles and colors across multiple Hunters to create a party that reflects your unique style.

■ Combat with Strategic Depth

We’ve built a combat system that goes beyond simple hack-and-slash, maximizing the thrill of strategic decision-making and precise control.

Sung Jinwoo Skill Tree

Sung Jinwoo’s growth is entirely in your hands. Choose and develop various skill trees, even the same Jinwoo can have a completely different combat style depending on your decisions. Grow him your way, with your own strategy.

Depth of Combat, Part 1: The Monarch System

It’s Time to Turn the Tide of Battle. We’ve implemented a Monarch Transformation system, a powerful feature that lets Sung Jinwoo awaken as the Monarch of Shadows. In this form, Jinwoo unleashes devastating skills that overwhelm enemies and dominate the battlefield. Based on your feedback, we’re actively enhancing the impact and speed of combat to deliver an even more intense and overwhelming battle experience. Get ready for a fight that feels truly powerful.

Depth of Combat, Part 2: Parry System

Take command of the battlefield. The parry system lets you precisely block enemy attacks, offering the thrill of skillful control and heightening the tension of each encounter. Successfully parry an attack to trigger a QTE, allowing you to exploit enemy openings and land a devastating counterstrike.

Depth of Combat, Part 3: Enhanced Hit Impact and Damage Feedback

Feel every moment of battle as if you were truly there. From the impact of striking enemies to the intensity of taking hits, every sensation has been amplified to deliver unmatched immersion, making it feel like you’ve thrown yourself right into the fight. Every blow and every hit will set your heart racing.

Enjoy Battle Even More 1: Overdrive System

The Overdrive System is being developed to maximize Sung Jinwoo’s skill tree and each Hunter’s unique traits, delivering overwhelming fun in combat.

With his skill tree—based Overdrive System, Sung Jinwoo dominates the battlefield. For example, when using the “Duel” skill tree, a special gauge will appear on the battle HUD. Once this gauge is filled to 100%, you can unleash a powerful skill specialized for that tree.

Hunters can showcase their individuality in combat through their own unique Overdrive Systems. For example, the Hunter Choi Jong-In can unleash meteors around him after applying Burn to enemies a certain number of times, shaking the battlefield with abilities that highlight his distinctive traits.

Enjoy Battle Even More 2: Chain Smash System

The Chain Smash System is a core mechanic that maximizes the synergy between skills. Triggered through additional input right after using a skill, Chain Smash grows stronger the more you chain it together.

By strategically deciding when to activate Chain Smash during your combos, you’ll experience an entirely new level of combat excitement.

■ Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE‘s Variety of Content

Cute Companion, Yaruru

Adorable shadows have flown in from another world to assist Hunters. Yaruru diligently picks up items, gathers resources, and always supports you faithfully by your side. Though small, Yaruru is a reliable companion.

Meet your very own companion by fulfilling special acquisition conditions.

A Vast World Map and an Immersive Main Story

Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE invites you into a world map and main story that faithfully capture the heart of the original work. Beyond the single chapter you experienced in the Demo version, the official release will feature Chapters 1 through 10 of the story. Each chapter will bring you new challenges and moving experiences to look forward to.

Four-Player Multiplayer with Friends

Leveling up alone can be fun, but sometimes the true excitement comes from playing with friends. Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE supports a multiplayer system for up to four players.

You can freely compose a party with any combination of Sung Jinwoo and Hunter parties. Whether it’s a full four-player Sung Jinwoo party, or a team of three Hunters and one Sung Jinwoo, you can strategize and enjoy cooperative gameplay. Conquer challenging dungeons together, defeat bosses, and experience the thrill of teamwork!

■ Closing Remarks

Dear Hunters, that’s all for today’s update.

Now it’s time for us to focus on developing the features we’ve introduced to you. As development progresses, if there are any new updates or things we’d like to share with you, we will greet you again through the Developer Notes.

Thank you.

—Solo Leveling: ARISE OVERDRIVE Team

item.title: ‘Hellish’ turn-based RPG Entropy announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
Publisher DreadXP and Dread Delusion developer Lovely Hellplace have announced “hellish” turn-based RPG Entropy for PC (Steam). It will launch in 2026.

Here is an overview of the game, via DreadXP:

About

Embracing the retro aesthetic of Dread Delusion, with a new flavor of unsettling locales and disturbing creatures, Entropy trades real-time, first-person combat for tactical turn-based battles inspired by classic JRPGs, featuring a party of up to six adventuring mercenaries faced with staving off the demonic invasion of their world.

In this dying age, only pockets of humanity remain. There was no grand apocalyptic event to speak of; only the cruel march of time and the inexplicable infertility of the world led us here. Accursed creatures stalk the barren lands between settlements, which are themselves terrible places; squalid, medieval, and mostly ruled by tyrants.

This tale begins in the town of Draenog, your theatre performance interrupted by fighting at the gates. Demons have arrived. As a simple thespian, your wooden prop sword will have to do for now; you must gather the troupe and defend yourselves!

So begins your quest as you journey across an expansive world map, littered with explorable towns filled with colorful characters. Forge your path on this expedition to hell to stop the demonic onslaught.

  • ❮
  • ❯

Key Features

  • Embark on a quest across the poisoned lands to stop the demonic incursion.
  • Control a party of up to six characters.
  • Hire Mercenaries to replace your fallen party members.
  • Tactical turn-based combat.
  • Explore a dying world full of unique characters, creatures, challenges, and treasure.
  • Level up your characters, increase your stats, and unlock new perks.
  • A beautiful retro 3D aesthetic.

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.
